Dungeon World

Over the while I am planning on completing the following:

  • Correcting the license
  • Updating frameworks used by the site
  • Finishing up cleaning up the formatting of all the content so that it looks consistent.
    • Playing
    • Classes
    • GMing
    • Monsters
    • Appendices
  • Updating the content based on revisions to the source material
  • Adding missing material
  • Adding search functionality

As I work on things, you may notice things looking off. Try a force refresh, if that doesn't work be sure to contact me and I will see if there is an issue with the site.
